item.title: Response info
item.description: Response information # Here is the first few lines of the data block for a model of count-type data at Rocky Mountain Network called rich.yml, which lives in the directory config/ROMN/LIBI # ==== DATA =================================================================== response info: file: data/ROMN/LIBI_richness_20171208_r.csv state variable: response column: - native.rich - native.forb.rich description: - Native species richness - Native forb species richness sampling method: plot sample id column(s): - Transect - Plot
